You lunge for the baby bird, hoping that you can use it as a shield. Even as you move, you feel a rush of wind asthe mother dives to protect her baby. You realizethat you've just made the stupidest decision ofyour life. Strangely, the mother bird did not harm you.Instead, you feel that you have been put into atrance.
